title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
summary: Implement secure multi-factor authentication and enforce role-based access controls for all users.
description: Develop a secure login system that uses multi-factor authentication to protect user accounts. Integrate with existing identity management tools to enforce role-based access controls, ensuring that users can only access services and features authorized for their respective roles. Features include password management, session timeout policies, and biometric and OTP authentication for enhanced security. This foundation ensures data confidentiality and compliance with banking security standards.

title: Personalized Dashboard and Product Visibility
summary: Design a customizable and responsive dashboard personalized to each customer's banking profile and eligibility.
description: Build an intuitive, user-friendly dashboard that dynamically presents relevant information such as available products, transaction summaries, and service eligibility based on the user's banking profile. Ensure the dashboard layout adapts seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile interfaces. Incorporate widgets, shortcuts to commonly used services, and quick links for improved user efficiency. Provide a consistent and engaging experience that encourages self-service and customer satisfaction.

title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Enable customers to initiate and manage requests for account openings and service modifications via digital workflows.
description: Develop guided workflows that allow customers to open new accounts, modify existing services, and apply for new products directly through the portal. Workflows must be streamlined with clear progress indicators, data validation steps, and minimal clicks for completion. Include functionality for uploading necessary documents, saving incomplete applications for later completion, and maintaining draft states. Ensure these workflows are fully integrated with backend systems to enable real-time processing and data synchronization.

title: Notifications and Real-Time Status Tracking
summary: Implement a system for real-time request updates and automated notifications across channels.
description: Develop a communication module that sends automated updates on request status changes, approvals, and rejections via in-portal notifications, email, and SMS. Include a request tracking feature where users can view real-time progress of account openings and service requests. The system must ensure secure message delivery, maintain detailed communication logs, and provide administrators the ability to configure notification templates and frequency based on business events.

title: Interaction History and Audit Trail Management
summary: Maintain a detailed and secure history of all customer interactions and transactions for reference and compliance.
description: Implement a comprehensive audit logging system to record customer interactions, requests, and system activities within the portal. Users should have access to a personal history view to monitor their past actions and request statuses. Administrators and auditors should be able to access detailed immutable logs for compliance and reporting. Ensure secure data storage, controlled access, and tamper-proof mechanisms to protect sensitive records from unauthorized modifications.

title: Core Banking System Integration and Database Optimization
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the core banking system while maintaining a dedicated performance-optimized database.
description: Establish real-time integration between the self-service portal and the bank’s core banking systems to synchronize customer, product, and transaction data. Maintain a separate optimized database for portal operations to handle customer interactions efficiently without overloading the core system. Implement caching, load balancing, and service queues to ensure seamless communication, high availability, and reliable performance during peak loads. Conduct thorough integration and performance testing prior to deployment.

title: Responsive Design and Accessibility Compliance
summary: Ensure the self-service portal provides a consistent and accessible experience across all devices.
description: Design a fully responsive front-end interface compatible with multiple devices and screen sizes, including desktops, tablets, and mobile phones. Follow modern accessibility standards (e.g., WCAG) to ensure ease of navigation for users with disabilities. Optimize performance for speed and consistency across browsers. Focus on usability, clarity, and mobile-first design principles to deliver a seamless experience that aligns with the bank’s digital transformation goals.
